app.name: SincroGitExclude
app.description: Manage git-excluded files with version control

status.excludedHint: This file is in .git/info/exclude (local only, not shared with your team)
status.notExcludedHint: This file is not in .git/info/exclude and may appear in git status
status.hasChangesHint: The deployed file has been modified since the last commit
status.syncedHint: The deployed file matches the last committed version
status.globallyExcludedHint: This file matches a pattern in your global git exclude (~/.config/git/ignore)
status.inGitIgnoreHint: This file is in the repository's .gitignore (shared with your team)
status.fileMissingHint: The deployed file was not found on disk â€” it may have been deleted externally

labels.name: Name
labels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

delete.willDeleteFromDisk: The deployed file will be deleted from disk
